item.description:
Do you want to feel good all the time and bring your health back into balance? Do you remember a time when you felt better but can’t quite get there again? At this lecture we will look at health from all areas of a person’s life including: nutrition, career, relationships, creativity, physical activity, spirit, etc.

Topics we will cover include:

Primary and secondary food
Health for Body, Mind, and Spirit
Holistic Nutrition
Lifestyle tips for healthy living
Energy giving relationships vs. Energy draining relationships

Come to the Larches Inn and meet Noelle ~ she is truely an amazing women with realistic ideas!

There will be no charge for this class, but donations are welcome.
item.name: A Holistic Approach to Health and Wellness - Come and Meet Noelle !!!
